import React, {useState} from "react"; import {Container } from "react-bootstrap"; import axios from 'axios'; function Form() { const [courseName, setCourseName] = useState('BLAH'); const [courseRating, setCourseRating] = useState(0); const [workload, setWorkload] = useState(0); const [prof, setProf] = useState(0); const submitForm = async() => { console.log("prof is ", prof); await axios.post('http://localhost:4000/submitRating', { course: courseName, prof: prof, }) .catch(() => { console.log("ERR in new submit form") }) } return (
setCourseName(event.target.value)} placeholder="CS-422"/>


setCourseRating(1)} />
setCourseRating(2)} />
setCourseRating(3)} />


setProf(1)} />
setProf(2)} />
setProf(3)} />


setWorkload(1)} />
setWorkload(2)} />
setWorkload(3)} />
) } export default Form;
